description:
8.53 asetrate
Set the sample rate without altering the PCM data.
This will result in a change of speed and pitch.

The filter accepts the following options:

r.description: Set the output sample rate. Default is 44100 Hz.

sample_rate.description: Set the output sample rate. Default is 44100 Hz.

name: asetrate

parameters.description: Set the output sample rate. Default is 44100 Hz.
parameters.name: sample_rate, r

source:
